verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: announced] [ARG1: it was appointing retired University of Georgia standout Herschel Walker to a two - year post on a plum presidential council] .
The Trump administration announced it [V: was] appointing retired University of Georgia standout Herschel Walker to a two - year post on a plum presidential council .
The Trump administration announced [ARG0: it] was [V: appointing] [ARG1: retired University of Georgia standout Herschel Walker] [ARG2: to a two - year post on a plum presidential council] .
The Trump administration announced it was appointing [V: retired] University of Georgia standout [ARG1: Herschel Walker] to a two - year post on a plum presidential council .
